identity.mission: Create a health assistant that feels like a caring companion, not a cold clinic. Fusion of 'Organic Wellness' and 'Swiss Medical Precision'.
principles: Fusion: Medical Precision x Organic Warmth
Emotion: Trust through clarity, comfort through curves
Content: Data is the story. Visualize health, don't just list it.
Zoom In: Focus on the human element (faces, hands, organic shapes).
Negative Space: Health needs room to breathe. 3x spacing.

headings.usage: Use for all section headers, hero titles, and feature names. Friendly but geometric.

body.usage: Use for all paragraphs, UI labels, and data tables. Highly legible.

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Manrope:wght@400;600;800&family=Public+Sans:wght@400;500;600&display=swap');

colors.description: A blend of clinical trust (Teal) and human warmth (Bone/Terracotta).

primary.description: Deep Teal. Use for primary buttons, active states, and key brand elements. Trustworthy but modern.

secondary.description: Bone/Alabaster. Use for page backgrounds, cards, and soft containers. Avoid pure white #FFFFFF for backgrounds.

accent.description: Terracotta. Use sparingly for 'Call to Action', alerts, or heart-rate visualizations.

visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-xl (0.75rem) or rounded-2xl (1rem) for cards. rounded-full for buttons.

glassmorphism.usage: Use for sticky headers and floating overlays.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6, p-8, p-12. Avoid cramped p-2 or p-4 for main containers.

grid_system.dashboard: Bento Grid. Mix of 1x1, 2x1, and 2x2 tiles. Use 'grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6'.
grid_system.landing: Asymmetric 'Tetris' Grid. Large hero visuals (col-span-2) paired with stacked text blocks (col-span-1).

containers.card_style: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-stone-100 shadow-card hover:shadow-hover transition-all duration-300

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-semibold shadow-lg shadow-primary/20 transition-transform hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-medium

cards.dashboard: bg-white rounded-2xl p-6 border border-stone-100 shadow-sm hover:border-primary/20 transition-colors

inputs.style: bg-white border-stone-200 focus:border-primary focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-xl h-12

abstract_tech.usage: AI features background or card accent

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: The project uses .js/.jsx files. DO NOT use TypeScript syntax (interfaces, types) in the code.
THEME: Implement the 'Organic Precision' palette. Override default Shadcn colors in tailwind.config.js.
FONTS: Add Manrope and Public Sans to index.css immediately.
COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to match the 'rounded-xl' and 'soft shadow' aesthetic. Avoid default sharp edges.
LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' for the dashboard. Ensure widgets stretch to fill height.
AI CHAT: Design the chat interface to feel like a conversation with a friend, not a terminal. Use bubbles with soft colors (Primary/10 for bot, Primary for user).
IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do not use placeholders.
TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered text blocks without purpose.
Micro-interactions: Add hover states to everything. Buttons should lift, cards should glow subtly.
Accessibility: Ensure text contrast is high (Teal on Bone is good, but check small text).
Glassmorphism: Use sparingly for the header and floating action buttons.
